Jesus the Good Shepherd Tribute: Funeral Prayer Cards

In honor of your cherished departed and their connection to divine guidance, we present our Jesus the Good Shepherd Funeral Prayer Cards. Each card features a captivating vintage image of Jesus as the Good Shepherd, tenderly guiding his flock of sheep, emanating timeless compassion and divine care, adorning the front as a symbol of heavenly solace and eternal protection. On the back, alongside a cherished photo of your loved one, these prayer cards offer a heartfelt tribute to their memory.

Embrace Divine Guidance: As you behold the vintage image of Jesus the Good Shepherd, find solace in the comforting presence it exudes. Let the tender care of the Shepherd bring comfort and reassurance to your heart during times of grief.

Symbol of Divine Protection: Jesus as the Good Shepherd symbolizes divine guidance, protection, and the unwavering love of the Savior. His gentle guidance serves as a reminder of the boundless protection and divine care bestowed upon us by divine grace, providing solace and strength in moments of sorrow.

Guiding Light: Let the sacred image of Jesus the Good Shepherd be a guiding light on your journey of mourning. May His compassionate guidance and protective embrace provide comfort and inspiration, illuminating the path towards healing and spiritual renewal amidst the challenges of grief.

Heartfelt Tribute: Each card bears the vintage image of Jesus the Good Shepherd on the front, offering a timeless tribute to your beloved departed and their connection to divine guidance. On the back, alongside a cherished photo of your loved one, is space for a personalized message or prayer, allowing you to express your love and gratitude with reverence and devotion.

Everlasting Love: As you hold these prayer cards in your hands, may you feel the eternal presence of your beloved departed amidst the tender care of Jesus the Good Shepherd. May their spirit find peace and rest in the loving protection of divine grace, forever cherished and remembered in the hearts of those who loved them.

Embrace the sacred beauty of the Jesus the Good Shepherd Funeral Prayer Cards, a heartfelt tribute to a life touched by the profound guidance and divine care of Christ. Price:$29.00
